Package hac.ex4.services

Class ProductService

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.services.ProductService
@Service public class ProductService extends Object
Service to provide access to product database.

  • Method Details

    • purchaseCart

      @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.sql.SQLException.class) public double purchaseCart(ShoppingCart cart) throws SQLException
      Make purchase of items in received cart, updates the database accordingly. Rollbacks if fails.
      Parameters:
      cart - Cart contains the items to purchase.
      Returns:
      The amount to pay for the purchase.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If purchase fails because some items do not exist or quantity is too low.

    • calculatePayment

      public double calculatePayment(ShoppingCart cart)
      Calculates the payment that should be made for a specific cart
      Parameters:
      cart - Cart to purchase
      Returns:
      The payment that should be made for that cart.

    • save

      public void save(Product product)
      Save a new product to the database.
      Parameters:
      product - New product to add to the database.

    • deleteIfExists

      public void deleteIfExists(long id)
      Delete product by id from database (if it exists).
      Parameters:
      id - id to find product by.

    • update

      public boolean update(Product product, long id)
      Updates product by new product and id, if exists.
      Parameters:
      product - New product details.
      id - id of the product to update.
      Returns:
      Whether update was successful (if id is in the database).

    • exists

      public boolean exists(long id)
      Returns whether a product exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - id to find product by.
      Returns:
      Whether product exists.

    • findById

      public Optional<Product> findById(long id)
      Find product by id.
      Parameters:
      id - To find product by.
      Returns:
      Optional of product contains the product, if exists (otherwise null).

    • findByNameContains

      public List<Product> findByNameContains(String name)
      Find products by name substring.
      Parameters:
      name - Name to find by.
      Returns:
      List of products matching that name.

    • getAll

      public List<Product> getAll()
      Get all products in the database.
      Returns:
      List of products in the database.

    • findTopDiscounts

      public List<Product> findTopDiscounts(int limit)
      Find the top discounted items in the database, limited by received value.
      Parameters:
      limit - Limit of the number of products in the list.
      Returns:
      List of the top discounted products, number is limited by value.
